TI_TEXT.P: Транспортни услуги (с изключение на извозването на отпадъци)
Servicios de transporte (excluido el transporte de residuos)
Services de transport (à l'exclusion du transport des déchets)
Servizi di trasporto (escluso il trasporto di rifiuti)
Servizzi ta' trasport (eskluż it-trasport ta' l-iskart)
Serviços de transporte (excl. transporte de resíduos)
Servicii de transport (cu excepţia transportului de deşeuri)

TITLE.P: Contract for Home to School and Adult Social Care Transport

SHORT_DESCR.P: This procurement is for transport for Home to School and School to Swimming lessons, and Adult Social Care 2017.
The contract is for transport for Home to School and School to Swimming lessons, and Adult Social Care. The expected start date for the proposed contract(s) is anticipated to be September 2017.
The expected start and end dates for each contract are set out in the relevant tender contract documents.
The proposed contracts are for an initial period as set out in the contract documents with an option to extend for up to a further 2 years to a maximum duration of 5 years.
